word: Am I... saying your name right?
A bedtime story? Can you only tell stories before bed?
I like the aquarium... But I like the blue water more.
I learn new things at school... But you're not there, so I don't like it.
Do you like my performance? I practiced lots.
What's my plushie based on? Um... It's a secret.
I wish it was fireworks day every day... Why? My teacher said "it's human to long for nice things, nya." A firework show is a nice thing, so I long for it.
Why did it burn? I followed the recipe to a T... Is it a heat and cooking time problem? Your instructions were too vague, like the "just enough" quantity in the recipe.
Do I feel ready for the exam? Like, you helped me study, but I'm still nervous... Why do we even have tests to begin with? Especially tests where there's more than one right answer...

$1, tell me the definition of a "good girl." To the best of my knowledge, it's a girl who is polite, well-behaved, and gets good grades... There is no set definition? That makes it so hard to grasp...
The amusement park is packed and I don't really wanna go. But if you do... then I guess I'll tag along.
Can I meet Santa if I stay up on Christmas Eve? ...Just to be clear, I'm NOT saying I believe in him. I'm curious, that's all.
Let me cook dinner at least once in a while. I'm not a little kid anymore.
I left a cake in the fridge. No, I didn't buy it for you, I just lost my appetite for cake.
$1, what kind of person do you hope I grow into?
I've bought all the ingredients for dinner, so I'd like to do the cooking tonight. Heehee, you just sit on the couch and relax, $1.
Why don't we go on vacation somewhere? Truth be told, I actually have plans for several destinations. All you need to do is choose which you'd like.

Which is your favorite between buttercream cake and Black Forest cake? Ah.. Yes, buttercream is more healthy, so let's go with that! ...Hm? Cake is cake, so there's not much difference in how healthy they are? Now, now, it's still worth fussing over!
I want to get you presents for all holidays, not just Christmas, New Year's, and Valentine's... Sounds like too much work? No, not at all. It's never too much work when I'm doing it for you. Heehee.
Be good now, $1. Behave, or I won't listen to anything you say.

Heehee. Wanna go hiking with me the next time the weather's good? ...Hm? You don't think you'll be able to keep up? I'm telling you, you don't get enough dang exercise! Ugh! We're DEFINITELY going hiking now to improve your cardio!
Tadaaah! I beat my last sprinting record! I'm pretty baller, ain't I? You should totally increase my allowance, then I might beat my record again!
Did I use my whole allowance to buy comics? N-no, obviously not! I just saved it all... Okay, I admit it! Yeah, I DID use it all on comics...
So Santa comes into the house at night through the fireplace... Wow! Then let's stay in the living room on the night of Christmas Eve! Come on, please!
Woohoo! Being grown-up means I get to ride more attractions at the amusement park! It's time to go buck wild! Let's go on that rollercoaster that's, like, 20 storeys tall! It'll be SO much fun!
I finished all the food I made.
I didn't want to eat the broccoli... but I did anyway.
What do well-behaved kids get after dinner? Dessert.
I brushed my teeth and washed my face like a good kid does.
My hair looks cute just the way it is today.
Maybe I'll style my hair into pigtails once in a while.
Bedtime stories always make me so sleepy.
It's this time again. A new story is going to play out in my dreams tonight.
Will we run out of bedtime stories before I grow up? Now I'm curious.
I played with wooden blocks and had fun.
Wow... I didn't think you could make a bridge THIS long out of wooden blocks.
It's so big, so tall... It reminds me of a castle tower.
My training for the day is done. Good job, me.
28, 29, 30... Okay, I've done my stretches!
My head is spinning... I feel like I'm going to fall over.
I played for a long while in the bath and had a lot of fun.
My new shower gel smells nice.
I played in the bathtub and got the floor all wet.
My knowledge deepened after listening to my teacher's lesson!
Why doesn't time go backwards if you turn back the hands on a clock?
My knowledge deepened after listening to my teacher's lesson!
What's the mass and volume of the sun?
My knowledge deepened after listening to my teacher's lesson!
What is there past the edge of the universe?
My physique improved after an intense PE class!
Is this as fast as I'm ever going to get?
My physique improved after an intense PE class!
My front crawl is faster than my breaststroke. Can I practice that more?
My physique improved after an intense PE class!
Will I get taller if I play more basketball?
My handicraft improved after absorbing a lot of art knowledge!
Will I ever learn how to make a grabber hand in handicrafts class?
My handicraft improved after absorbing a lot of art knowledge!
If you build a bridge over the sea using sticks, how will that affect its load capacity?
My handicraft improved after absorbing a lot of art knowledge!
Will the creative skills I develop in handicraft class be useful in the future?
My enunciation improved after learning new things about music theory!
Why does stringing different notes together create music?
My enunciation improved after learning new things about music theory!
Why do we use so many rests at the start of a song?
My enunciation improved after learning new things about music theory!
If you sing solo, can you take a break right after you're done with your part?
My grasp on shading deepened after practicing it a lot!
Do beginner artists have to start with rough sketches?
My grasp on shading deepened after practicing it a lot!
Why do you have to draw the shadows before you color the picture in?
My grasp on shading deepened after practicing it a lot!
What's the difference between photorealistic and abstract art?
My body became more flexible after rehearsing dancing!
Is dancing a test of your body's flexibility?
My body became more flexible after rehearsing dancing!
Different kinds of dances need different kinds of shoes. Is that because they apply force differently?
My body became more flexible after rehearsing dancing!
Why is it that when different teachers perform the same dance, it never looks the same?
My stagecraft improved after learning new things about acting!
Is "embodying a character" about being cast in the right role or having good acting skills?
My stagecraft improved after learning new things about acting!
Creating conflict is how you build tension in drama... How do you do that?
My stagecraft improved after learning new things about acting!
If you get so immersed in a role that you forget yourself, will your own acting talents even show?
My writing got better after practicing calligraphy during class!
Horizontal stroke, vertical stroke, sweeping stroke... Am I holding the brush right?
My writing got better after practicing calligraphy during class!
Getting better at calligraphy is really, really hard.
My writing got better after practicing calligraphy during class!
In the world of calligraphy, are characters like people, or are people like characters?
My cooking skills improved after practicing a bit!
Heat tea leaves and sugar in a pot, add milk and boil it all... It worked!
My cooking skills improved after practicing a bit!
I was making a cake and put too much sugar in the batter...
My cooking skills improved after practicing a bit!
I meant to cook a cream stew, but ended up making a curry instead. It was a tasty mistake, so it was fine.
My gardening skills improved after practicing a bit!
I need to remember to water the plants... but how much water is enough?
My gardening skills improved after practicing a bit!
I broke up the soil and an earthworm crawled out of the pot.
My gardening skills improved after practicing a bit!
I was uprooting weeds and removed a seedling by mistake.
My athletic skills improved after practicing a bit!
My whole body always feels stiff the day after I exercise.
My athletic skills improved after practicing a bit!
I'm so tired... I can't do one more squat...
My athletic skills improved after practicing a bit!
Dizzy... So dizzy... I'll try a lighter weight next time.
My drawing skills improved after practicing a bit!
Black, white, grey... Hmm. I need to practice this more.
My drawing skills improved after practicing a bit!
Why does paint type affect a painting's quality?
My drawing skills improved after practicing a bit!
My observation skills might improve if I sketch a lot of busts.
My tea ceremony skills improved after practicing a bit!
The seiza position makes my legs go numb. I need to get used to sitting like this.
My tea ceremony skills improved after practicing a bit!
First you put in the powdered matcha... No, wait, do you boil the water first?
My tea ceremony skills improved after practicing a bit!
I've drunk so much tea that it's getting hard to tell the difference between rich and dilute anymore.
My acting skills improved after practicing a bit!
To be or not to be... that is the question.
My acting skills improved after practicing a bit!
Another day of honing my stagecraft.
My acting skills improved after practicing a bit!
Performances that even the actors get lost in are what give birth to classic plays.
My music skills improved after practicing a bit!
Playing the piano is more of a workout than I imagined.
My music skills improved after practicing a bit!
Waltzes, sonatas... There are so many styles that it's hard to keep track.
My music skills improved after practicing a bit!
The synthesizer can imitate all sorts of instruments, but what is its own timbre?
My general knowledge deepened after practicing a bit!
You can figure out your orientation just by observing the stars and the sun.
My general knowledge deepened after practicing a bit!
What is there on the dark side of the moon?
My general knowledge deepened after practicing a bit!
When will we be able to observe black holes in a meaningful way?
My expressiveness improved after rehearsing on stage!
My choreography and music choice are both flawless!
My expressiveness improved after rehearsing on stage!
It's harder than I thought to weave a story out of music and dancing...
My expressiveness improved after rehearsing on stage!
Acting and singing are both equally important. I'll need more practice.
I feel really satisfied after finishing a bunch of commissions!
Draw a clock lying lazily on a couch... What a weird commission.
Draw a red bird with a colorful tail... What kind of animal is that?
Okay... My piece that strikes a balance between abstraction and photorealism is done!
I feel really satisfied after organizing a cluttered bookshelf!
I tripped while organizing a bookcase. Luckily, nobody saw it.
We stocked up on a popular comic and it sold out by the evening.
When there are no customers around, I secretly practice the poses the comic book heroes do when they use their big moves.
I feel really satisfied after a busy shift at the farm!
I was cleaning and bumped into a cat lying on the ground that wouldn't budge... so I moved it.
A goose caught me off guard and chased me around.
I picked some fruits growing in the trees and fed them to the farm animals. I hope they liked them.
I feel really satisfied after getting a good workout at the gymnasium!
I found a secret snack bar in the gymnasium. Sweet!
I bought an energy drink you can only get in the gymnasium. It tasted pretty good.
I heard some weird stories about the gymnasium and now I'm a little scared...
I feel more confident in my abilities after finishing a performance!
Break a leg means "good luck." You learn something new every day.
I said the wrong line on stage...
I made my own props. It felt really gratifying!
I feel more confident in my abilities after finishing a performance!
I made a small error during the chorus. Luckily, nobody noticed.
I was nervous during the solo and sang out of tune. I'll try to calm my nerves for next time.
My mini-concert went swimmingly. Great job, me.
I feel more confident in my abilities after finishing a performance!
Someone said my action pose was the best they'd ever seen!
I said, "I'm just a passerby. Remember this" and it became a classic quote.
Today, I got in a situation where I had to improvise, and it was surprisingly well-received.
I feel more confident in my abilities after selling our whole discounted stock today!
All I said was, "50% off" and we immediately sold out.
Offering free eggs with each purchase was more effective than advertising like there was no tomorrow. Wow...
As it turns out, you need a loudspeaker if you're going to advertise verbally. My voice is gone...
I feel more confident in my abilities after making the house nice and tidy!
I've polished the floor to a mirror sheen. Too bad it's really slippery now.
It's so satisfying to see everything looking so neat and organized.
I was running a bath, got impatient, and ended up burning my hand.
I had a busy and exhausting yet fulfilling day!
Organizing shelves is a lot more work than I expected.
Ding the register, bag the groceries, heat the lunches... Today was a busy day.
I read a few comic books in the break room and regained my energy.
I had a busy and exhausting yet fulfilling day!
It's so invigorating to smell the aroma of coffee the whole day.
I made my first successful latte art. I might have a natural knack for this.
I got a small cake as a job-well-done gift. It made me happy.
My body and spirit feel refreshed after sleeping at home the whole day.
I had a nice dream. Feeling so good now!
I had a dream where I could do anything...
I had a nightmare. I'm drenched in sweat...
I dreamed that $1 gave me a lot of pocket money...
I saw a cat on the way home and played with it for a bit.
I tried to pet a dog I came across. It barked at me.
I bought a new flavor of onigiri at the convenience store. It tasted great.
There was a weird cloud in the sky. I stared at it for a long while.
I saw a UFO! Or so I thought, but it was just a kite.
It was really windy today, and the potato chips at the supermarket were on sale.
I got a "lucky chocolate" so they gave me more for free. That was nice.
I got lost in thought and tripped on something...
When you really think about it... you don't need to do homework if you throw it into a fire.
I found a store that sells really good pastries. I'll be sure to visit it again.
I fed some birds at the park.
While on a walk, I saw a cherry blossom tree in bloom. It looked beautiful.
I bought that new toy I saw in an ad.
I bought a cup of milk tea. It was yummy!
I came across a dog on the way home. I used some of my allowance to buy it a treat.
No homework from the teacher today. Nice.
I met a cat who claimed to be a "talent scout." They were probably lying.
This newest comic is so fun that I lost track of time. I kept reading all the way until dinnertime.
I went out to buy study materials at the bookstore, but I ended up going restaurant hopping instead.
I went restaurant hopping for a long while, trying out different dishes...
I ordered a coffee. The barista made latte art for me, but I had no idea what it was.
I bought an extra special baozi. They only sell 50 of these a day. Lucky me!
I attended a cooking class that was held at a restaurant. Rolling pins are so weird...
By luck, I got to participate in a restaurant event and got a chocolate-glazed cake as a gift!
Apparently they're having an event at the gastronomy district. Let's go check it out.
I'm stuffed like a turkey. I think I'll pass on dinner tonight.
A cooking competition...
It looks like they're hosting a cook-off. Let's enter it.
Things got a bit hectic for a while, but I got through it.
All my hard work paid off and I got first place!
I gave it a good shot and got a decent placing.
That didn't go so well... I'll win next time!
It looks like they're hosting a second cook-off. Let's enter it.
Things got a bit hectic for a while, but I got through it.
All my hard work paid off and I got first place!
I gave it a good shot and got a decent placing.
That didn't go so well... I'll win next time!
This is the third cook-off now...
It looks like they're hosting yet another cook-off. Let's enter it.
Things got a bit hectic for a while, but I got through it.
All my hard work paid off and I got first place!
I gave it a good shot and got a decent placing.
That didn't go so well... I'll win next time!
Today, at my job, I made...
A leaf dish that's on the simple side. Boiled lettuce!
A meat dish with a savory flavor. Honey pork chops!
A pie loaded with meat and veggies, cooked to perfection. Stew pot pie!
A Dragon Empery holiday staple. A dumpling platter!
An excellent side dish to go with rice. Mapo tofu!
A cousin of the banana split. Banana crepe with whipped cream!
A mix of greens and reds boiled in a broth of soy sauce, rice wine, and a little sugar. Meat and veggie stew!
An exquisite meat dish, marinated and topped with fresh seasoning. Spare lamb ribs with rosemary!
A marriage of fried pork and sliced bread. Pork cutlet sandwiches!
Something I came up with in a flash of inspiration. A mystery dish! I wonder how it tastes?
Fishing takes patience. I just need to stay calm and...
Oh! I caught something! A small crayfish. It's not much... but at least I won't go home emptyhanded.
Put some energy into it... Oh! I caught a small fish!
This one's heavy! What could be... Oh. It's just an old tire.
A big one took the bait! I caught a large fish!
I caught a big lobster! Wait... Why are there lobsters here?
Pull! Put your back into it! ...Oh no! The hook came loose...
I passed a lot of time at the resort...
I played with the animals on the farm. It was fun.
I was playing by the water and accidentally fell in. Luckily, the water was really clean, so my clothes didn't get dirty!
An angry cow chased after me! Thank goodness I'm a quick runner!
I watered the crops in the field. It was gratifying work.
I, uh... planted something, but I can't remember what.
Hooah! I chopped down a tree!
I carelessly tripped on a fence. On the bright side, I didn't get hurt.
I worked hard all day and reaped a big harvest!
I learned a surprising amount about farming at the resort. It was fun!
A fishing competition?
It sounds like they're doing an angling competition. Let's enter it.
Just have to wait until I feel a nibble...
I caught a huge fish! It's the largest across the board!
I caught a fish! All things considered, not bad!
Not a single bite... I'll catch something next time!
Fishing again... Should I give it another shot?
It sounds like they're doing a second angling competition. Let's enter it.
Just have to wait until I feel a nibble...
I caught a huge fish! It's the largest across the board!
I caught a fish! All things considered, not bad!
Not a single bite... I'll catch something next time!
Do you think I'll catch much in this weather?
As expected, they're doing a third angling competition. Let's enter it and see if we catch anything.
Just have to wait until I feel a nibble...
I caught a huge fish! It's the largest across the board!
I caught a fish! All things considered, not bad!
Not a single bite... I'll catch something next time!
I drew a mountain landscape.
I drew a white naval coat.
I drew a picture of $1.
I'm happy with what I drew today. I'll frame it when I get home.
My drawing turned out a bit abstract, but it's still memorable. I'll frame it when I get home.
I tried a new drawing technique and I'm happy with the result. I'll put it in my drawer for safekeeping.
I drew a picture of two people in a relationship today. It looks nice, so I'll bring it home as a souvenir.
I finished drawing a scene full of life. I'll bring it home and reference it when I need inspiration.
I like how I colored this piece. I'll take it home with me and frame it.
The scenery here is great. Perfect place to camp out.
I didn't bring many measures against insects, but I managed to avoid being bitten. Nice!
I wanted to pick some wild flowers, but there were bees around so instead I just watched them.
I sat by the campfire and roasted some marshmallows. They were tasty!
I went bug-catching and caught a butterfly!
It was both spiritually and physically reinvigorating to breathe in Mother Nature's fresh air.
I shared my nuts with a squirrel, which was fun.
The commercial area is so magical. I could look around forever.
The fruit store owner gave me a gift. How nice of them.
While shopping, I found the next volume of a comic I wanted to read. Nice!
I bought some jello at the store and ate it.
I took a lot of pretty photos today. Feels nice!
I feel sad that I couldn't afford the instrument I wanted. Maybe next week!
I bought a cute stuffed animal today, so I'm happy about that!
I sat on a bench and read a book for a while. It was relaxing.
A new store cropped up on the street corner. I went there and read comics the whole day.
I came across a street musician. They seemed really cool.
The brochure says, "A good picture tells a story."
It seems they're having a photography contest. Let's enter it.
I went above and beyond to express myself with my camera.
My photo stood out for its expressiveness and won the "best story" award!
My photo was unremarkable, but pretty. I'm happy with that result!
I couldn't for the life of me figure out how to take a photo... I'll do better next time.
Their music was fantastic. I couldn't take my eyes off them.
A street band is performing in the commercial area. Let's go check it out.
I took a photo of the avenue outside school.
The journey to school is a very everyday thing, though something about it still feels odd...
The photo I took today was really expressive. I'm going to develop it and put it in my album.
I took a photo of the gymnasium.
This looks better than I expected! This could be in a sports magazine!
I couldn't quite get my subject in focus, but the mood is still there in the photo.
I took a photo of a city street.
I tried to imitate the look of a successful person. Somehow, that made me more conscious of myself!
I'm very satisfied with how this photo came out. I'll get it developed at a large size!
I took a photo of the school library.
Ah, the library! Where countless teens spent countless hours studying countless subjects!
I thought I looked really awkward while posing for this picture, but seeing it now, I look fine!
I took a photo in the pastry shop.
I can still smell the sweet scent of bread and cakes in the air.
This expression looks perfect! I'll be sure to frame this photo!
I took a photo of cherry blossom trees in full bloom.
The beautiful moment of a tree blooming, now immortalized thanks to my camera.
This is my best photo of today! I'll develop it in a few sizes and put them up around the house.
I took a picture of the concert hall in an old castle.
There is an old piano in the abandoned castle. Its sound is lonesome and filled with pain.
I took a photo at the water park.
Does going to the water park count as a vacation? It should.
I took a photo inside the classroom.
Uniforms, backpacks, the setting sun. It all screams "teenage years"!
I took a photo of the gastronomy district.
Hairbuns, qipaos, mapo tofu... Are they too cliché?
There's so much to do on the beach, like...
Building a sandcastle! Mix the sand with a bit of water aaand... It's done!
Sunbathing. I love taking in the warm sunlight.
Catching the ball and throwing it back! Beach volleyball is so much fun.
Picking shells out of the sand. So pretty.
Splitting watermelons blindfolded! Let's see who can crack the most.
Ignoring everything else and going straight for the food carts! I love the food they have on the beach.
Star of Tomorrow? Is that like a talent show?
It looks to be a competition where you show off your unique skills. Let's enter it.
I gave it my all up on the stage.
I won the competition! I'm a true star of tomorrow!
They didn't think I was that exceptional. Still, it was fun to perform on stage.
My rating doesn't reflect my potential. I'll show them what I'm made of next time.
Here it is again... I want to give it another shot.
The Star of Tomorrow Awards are on again. Let's enter.
I gave it my all up on the stage.
I won the competition! I'm a true star of tomorrow!
They didn't think I was that exceptional. Still, it was fun to perform on stage.
My rating doesn't reflect my potential. I'll show them what I'm made of next time.
This is it... I'm going to do it this time.
The Star of Tomorrow Awards are on once more. Let's give it a shot.
I gave it my all up on the stage.
I won the competition! I'm a true star of tomorrow!
They didn't think I was that exceptional. Still, it was fun to perform on stage.
My rating doesn't reflect my potential. I'll show them what I'm made of next time.
This is a story about fighting and striving for world peace, but being unable to pursue love.
To be or not to be, that is the question.
To be swept up by the changing tides of time – is it a blessing, or a misfortune?
I'd love to meet the Youkai Troupe myself.
Most romance stories begin around the season when these trees flower.
Wait a second, this play feels strangely familiar...
There has to be more than meets the eye to this empty classroom.
Why is she talking about how you build a ship?
Can such a small plan really capture the heart?
The lights are lit every night in the old castle, waiting alone at the end of time.
I visited the aquarium for a long while.
I saw some jellyfish at the aquarium. I thought they were cute.
My eyes were glued to a shark at the aquarium. They're surprisingly dopey and not scary at all.
I tried to complete a stamp collection at the aquarium, but I couldn't get them all. I'll try again another time.
The aquarium's drinks and food weren't so good. I'll have a proper meal later.
I saw a penguin and its egg at the aquarium. It made me hungry for fried eggs.
I couldn't take my eyes off the fish in the glass tunnel. They were so beautiful.
I saw a see-through fish at the aquarium. It was such a weird experience.
I wanted to buy a souvenir at the aquarium, but in the end, I just bought a coconut to drink from.
I had a boatload of fun at the amusement park.
The pirate ship was such a thrilling ride! I want to go on it again!
I rode the tea cups! Now I know what they mean by, "make your eyes spin."
I tried an escape room and beat it in record time! Wow!
I went into a maze and got lost... Luckily, I managed to find the exit in the end.
I watched one of the amusement park's shows and it was fun!
I ate a tasty burger at the amusement park and it recharged my batteries!
I bought a candy apple at the amusement park. It was a bit too sweet for me...
I had a lot of fun at World of Wonder.
I rode the swing a lot. It's almost like flying, and I like it.
The slide was so much fun. I wanna go on it again.
I used the seesaw a lot. Going up and down and up again is fun.
I rode a rocking chair.
I sat on the swing and did nothing but look at the sky for a while.
I bought a kid's meal and ate it clean.
I bought a cute balloon. I like it a lot.
I'm getting close to beating my record. Need to keep trying!
My moves are getting smoother and smoother! I should be able to get better results!
Dangit! I was THIS close, but I couldn't beat my record!
I wandered around the gymnasium.
I saw a cute kitten and stopped to play with it.
I reached the goal line at the track, but then I tripped...
I got an energy drink you can't find anywhere but here. How lucky!
I found a shortcut to the gastronomy district through the sports ground. This will save me time from now on!
I did some target practice. It was a lot of fun!
I went for a refreshing sprint around the field.
I went out in light clothing and caught a cold by the time I was home again...
A sports competition...
There's a lot of excitement building around this sports competition. Let's enter it!
I worked up a big sweat on the sports field.
I got great results! They said I'm going to get a trophy!
My results were only average, but it felt good to get some exercise!
I couldn't perform like I hoped and didn't get good results... I'll try harder next time.
They're running a second sports competition...
There's a lot of excitement building around this event again. Let's enter it!
I worked up a big sweat on the sports field.
I got great results! They said I'm going to get a trophy!
My results were only average, but it felt good to get some exercise!
I couldn't perform like I hoped and didn't get good results... I'll try harder next time.
That's the third sports competition now...
There's once again a lot of excitement building around this event again. Let's enter it!
I worked up a big sweat on the sports field.
I got great results! They said I'm going to get a trophy!
My results were only average, but it felt good to get some exercise!
I couldn't perform like I hoped and didn't get good results... I'll try harder next time.
There's a soccer match happening this week. Let's go check it out.
The score was 2-0! I'm disappointed that the team I was rooting for lost, but they gave it their best to the very end! We should all have that never-give-up mentality.
The score was 2-2! A draw. They might do a penalty shoot-out!
The score was 2-1! I'm disappointed that the team I was rooting for lost by 1 point, but there's always next time!
The score was 0-2! They won! Hooray!
The score was 1-2! I feel inspired after watching that game!
The score was 1-1! The match continued into overtime. I wonder who will win in the end!
I spent a long while in the library.
I read a book about baking and deepened my knowledge.
I read a book about health. I'm going to start taking better care of my body.
I read an anthology of children's tales. It gave me a bit of inspiration.
I wrote the outline of a small story. I'll expand it into a fun kid's story later.
I felt inspired, so I wrote the plot summary of a mystery story. I'll work out the logic later!
I read a few books that seemed interesting. I feel like I've learned a lot.
Ideas flowed out of me like a wellspring, so I wrote a poem. It felt pretty good!
I spent a long while in the music classroom.
I practiced singing and playing on the guitar... but the results weren't great.
I played a classical piece on the piano. I'm getting better and better at this!
I tried to compose a song to some lyrics I wrote, but it didn't pan out. I'll give it another shot after I've learned more!
I practiced with the violin for quite a while. My neck feels numb now, but it did make me a better violinist!
The clarinet is really tricky, but I did get a little better after practicing with it!
The harp sounds so mystical and graceful. I got engrossed in my own performance.
I sang my heart out into the microphone. I'm happy with how my voice sounded.
I went on a stroll around the academy.
I found a small garden on the roof of a separate building. What a nice surprise!
I fed some pigeons around the academy and we became friends.
I got my hands on the most delicious chocolate cake on the whole campus. Hooray.
I practiced in cooking class and successfully made my favorite meal as of late. Yummy!
I found a romance book with no listed author in the library. I didn't read it, though.
A writing contest...
Seems they're accepting submissions from anyone. Let's enter it.
Following the theme, I channeled my ideas and feelings through my pen.
My beautifully polished writing was second to none!
They said my work was run-of-the-mill, but well-paced.
Even I'm not sure what I was trying to write... I'll give it another shot next time.
An art contest...
They're hosting a drawing contest from the looks of it. Let's enter it.
I painted the canvas as my heart dictated.
My art was brimming with creativity and won first place!
My art was pretty average, but did garner appreciation for the raw skill on display.
My art was a bit too avant-garde... I'll draw something more normal next time.
A singing competition...
Looks like they're hosting a singing contest. Let's enter it.
I sang my heart out on the stage.
My sublime and sincere performance received glowing praise!
I messed up the lyrics... I only got an average grading.
My singing was off-key... I'll do better next time!
The school library is offering writing courses. Let's apply for one.
I learned a lot from their in-depth teaching. My mind has become a wellspring of ideas!
The school art class is offering drawing courses. Let's apply for one.
I learned a lot from their in-depth teaching. I feel like I understand drawing much better now!
The school music class is offering singing courses. Let's apply for one.
I learned a lot from their in-depth teaching. Singing is almost starting to feel like second nature!
Capture and immortalize those beautiful moments in time.
